'''Layla''' is a playable [[Cryo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is a student in the [[Rtawahist]] Darshan, specializing in Theoretical Astrology. Chronically sleep-deprived and of poor health as a result, Layla believes that "The Stars' Blessing" is the reason she wakes from sleepwalking to find her papers fully completed.
